transcript.text: a question let's start with you
Professor chsky the Nicaraguan
government official who recently
defected has stated that regardless of
Peace efforts the Nicaraguan government
will pursue a policy of military
expansion with the Soviet Union why or
why shouldn't with with the Soviet Union
why or why shouldn't we believe their
claims that this is to be a defensive
Force well uh he's speaking of K Miranda
who did not State uh read the documents
that he produced he did not state or in
any way imply that Nicaragua was
intending regardless of peace to carry
out a policy of military expansion with
the Soviet Union what Miranda stated
true or false was the following uh first
uh in fact the only newsworthy uh and in
fact novel statement that he produced
was that the United States had been
vastly exaggerating the number of Cuban
and Soviet advisers in Nicaragua which
is much lower than what the United
States had claimed according to him and
approximately what Nicaragua had stated
uh he said that if uh in the coming
years uh if the Contra War declines
Nicaragua would reduce the size of its
military forces that was what he stated
it would reduce the size of its military
forces and it would provide light arms
to the civilian population to defend the
country against the threat which
continues and is constantly raised the
threat of a possible us
uh military Invasion that means they
would try to turn the country into
something roughly like Israel a nation

uh was combined with an enormous

commun sophisticated communication
equipment to provide them with
information in real time about the

could proceed to attack soft Targets in
accord with our uh directives and it's
well known that the only way that they
can try to protect their territory
against constant military intrusion by
the United States is with jet
interceptors there's no other way to do
it uh so uh yes they're trying to defend
their territory uh that's essentially
the gist of the U Miranda exposures it's
kind of interesting that the United

we regard it as scandalous for any

against our attack if any country tries
to obtain planes uh from France or
anyone else to defend itself against our

from
that Mr PE what about shouldn't we
